    Methods in hotel.structures that return Date
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Date
    Date.add(int days)
    Used to add a certain number of days to the date, considering that day overflow will have to add to the months, and month overflow will add to the year
    Methods in hotel.structures with parameters of type Date
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    Room.addNewReservation(Reservation reservation, Date current_date)
    addNewReservation(Reservation, Date) tries to add a reservation to the LinkedList and returns how much space will there be between the new reservation and the pre-existing reservations for a BestsFit algorithm on another class.
    int[]
    Room.checkAvailable(Reservation newReservation, Date current_date)
    checkAvailable takes one Reservation and returns an integer array of two digits: The first integer will be equivalent to the index the reservation should be added to ensure it is ordered by date, the second integer will represent how much free space is between the new reservation and the pre-existing ones (used for Best-Fit Algorithm).
    int
    Date.compare(Date date)
    Used to compare if this date is earlier, equal or later than the given date
    int
    Date.getDifference(Date date)
    Gets the (absolute) difference between this date and the parameter
